|vendor_id = 1737 |device_id = 1032 |subvendor_id = 1737 |subdevice_id = 0024 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |ethoui = 00:18:F8
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8169S-32; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames -->

|powledcolor = none |connactled = yes |spdledcolor = yes |leddupcolor = none |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''[[Linksys]]''' and '''[[Cisco Systems]]''' logos, "A Division of Cisco Systems, Inc.", "10/100/1000 Gigabit Network Adapter", "Model No: EG1032 ver. 3" is silkscreened on the card by the PCI bracket. :"A\N:GPCGM1670-LC0-RR410", "P\N:GGM1670 Rev.RR", and "START: 2005/07/13" is silkscreened on the top of the card on the non-connector end. From other devices, this text seems common to '''[[Runtop]]''' devices :A label affixed to the back of the card reads "R4830FB00618 GGM1670 RR".
[[Category:English Documentation]]
